title: in game widow???
body: for some reason when i join a game it is like a widow with close button and etc. what should i do for full screen? This also dont let me on free cam mode not to godown with camera. Help me plz

replies.body:
Hop into a custom match, then hit the **ESC** key, then find **VIDEO** under the options menus. Under *windowed mode*, select **FULL SCREEN**. Hit **OKAY** and you should be good to go.

Let me know if you have any questions.
